content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can apply for English Assessment through a number of apps - just choose the most preferable for you \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/start\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/workplace/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Telescope\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Within 7-14 working days after that, you will receive an email asking to choose the time and date of the Assessment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why is it important?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is a wide range of EPAM internal courses (including long-term and short-term English classes). To subscribe to most of them the determined level of English is a must.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#172b4d\"}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Most customers search for new team members with an appropriate level of English. So having this information in your profile will help you to find new projects and opportunities.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#172b4d\"}}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":133934,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b3f67aea-f42f-40df-a06d-acb5246bb147/image2019-9-30_16-24-31.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b3f67aea-f42f-40df-a06d-acb5246bb147/image2019-9-30_16-24-31.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"image2019-9-30_16-24-31.png\",\"name\":\"image2019-9-30_16-24-31.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b3f67aea-f42f-40df-a06d-acb5246bb147\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":799,\"height\":275},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#172b4d\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Assessment consists of a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"speaking test\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and is conducted online using MS Teams. You may find more information about the Assessment procedure on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/Language+Assessment\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"the Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" page.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The results of the assessment will be displayed in your corporate profile.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
